title: To be of use wine or oil and corn

content.question: The speaker mentions “wine or oil” (line 22) and “corn” (line 23) to highlight the

choices.label: functional nature of some venerated objects
enigmatic purpose of certain historical artifacts

content.answer: functional nature of some venerated objects

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
